privacy.title: PRIVACY POLICY
privacy.introText1: Welcome to MovieApp's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how MovieApp ("we", "our", or "us") collects, uses, shares, and protects your personal information when you use our website, mobile applications, and services (collectively, the "Services").
privacy.introText2: By using our Services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree with any part of this policy, please do not use our Services.
privacy.infoCollectText: We collect several types of information for various purposes to provide and improve our Services to you:
privacy.personalInfoText: When you create an account, we collect information such as your name, email address, and password. If you make purchases through our platform, we collect payment information, billing address, and transaction history.
privacy.usageInfoText: We collect information about how you interact with our Services, including the movies you view, search queries, pages visited, time spent on the platform, and features used.
privacy.deviceInfoText: We collect information about the devices you use to access our Services, including device type, operating system, browser, IP address, and mobile device identifiers.
privacy.locationInfoText: With your consent, we collect information about your general location to show you relevant movie sessions and theaters near you.
privacy.infoUseText: We use the information we collect for various purposes, including:
privacy.infoShareText: We may share your information with:
privacy.serviceProvidersText: Third-party companies that perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, data analysis, email delivery, and customer service.
privacy.businessPartnersText: Theater operators and film distributors to facilitate ticket purchases and provide relevant information about movie showings.
privacy.legalRequirementsText: When required by law or when we believe disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request.
privacy.businessTransfersText: In connection with any merger, sale of company assets, financing, or acquisition of all or a portion of our business.
privacy.noSelling: We do not sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.
privacy.dataSecurityText: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the security of your personal information. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy.yourRightsText: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, including:
privacy.policyChangesText: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

terms.title: TERMS OF SERVICE
terms.acceptanceText1: Welcome to MovieApp. By accessing or using our website, mobile applications, and services (collectively, the "Services"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use the Services.
terms.acceptanceText2: These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and MovieApp LLC ("we," "us," or "our"). Please read them carefully before using our Services.
terms.servicesText: MovieApp provides a platform for users to discover movies, view information about films, purchase tickets to movie sessions, and maintain a personalized movie experience. Our Services may include, but are not limited to:
terms.userAccountsText1: To access certain features of our Services, you may be required to create an account. When creating an account, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information about yourself. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms.ticketsText1: When you purchase movie tickets through our Services, you are entering into a transaction with the theater operator, not with MovieApp. While we facilitate the transaction, the theater's own terms and conditions regarding ticket refunds, exchanges, and canceled showings will apply.
terms.ticketsText2: Generally, movie tickets are non-refundable except in cases of technical failure, canceled showings, or as otherwise permitted by the theater operator. If you wish to request a refund, you should contact the theater directly or contact our customer service for assistance.
terms.ticketsText3: MovieApp charges a service fee for ticket purchases. This fee is non-refundable even if the ticket price is refunded.
terms.userContentText1: Our Services may allow you to post, upload, or submit content such as reviews, ratings, comments, and other materials ("User Content"). You retain ownership of your User Content, but by submitting it to our Services, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, sublicensable, and transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, prepare derivative works of, display, and perform your User Content in connection with the Services and our business.
terms.userContentText2: You are solely responsible for your User Content. By posting User Content, you represent and warrant that:
terms.prohibitedText: When using our Services, you agree not to:
terms.intellectualText1: The Services and all content and materials included on the Services, such as text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, are the property of MovieApp or our licensors and are protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.
terms.intellectualText2: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to use the Services for their intended purposes. This license does not include:
terms.disclaimerText1: THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS. MOVIEAPP MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE OPERATION OF THE SERVICES OR THE INFORMATION, CONTENT, MATERIALS, OR PRODUCTS INCLUDED ON THE SERVICES.
terms.disclaimerText2: TO THE FULL EXTENT PERMISSIBLE BY APPLICABLE LAW, MOVIEAPP DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
terms.liabilityText: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, MOVIEAPP SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, OR ANY LOSS OF PROFITS OR REVENUES, WHETHER INCURRED DIRECTLY OR INDIRECTLY, OR ANY LOSS OF DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, RESULTING FROM (A) YOUR ACCESS TO OR USE OF OR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE THE SERVICES; (B) ANY CONDUCT OR CONTENT OF ANY THIRD PARTY ON THE SERVICES; OR (C) UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS, USE, OR ALTERATION OF YOUR TRANSMISSIONS OR CONTENT.
terms.changesText: We reserve the right to update or modify these Terms at any time without prior notice. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on our Services. Your continued use of the Services following the posting of revised Terms means that you accept and agree to the changes.
terms.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:

faq.title: FAQ
faq.cantFind: Can't find what you're looking for?

whatIs.question: What is MovieApp?
whatIs.answer: MovieApp is a digital platform that allows users to discover, track, and stay updated about the latest movies and cinema sessions. Our service provides a comprehensive database of films with detailed information, ratings, and reviews to help you make informed viewing decisions.

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer: Creating an account on MovieApp is simple and free. Click on the "Sign Up" button in the upper right corner of the homepage. Fill out the registration form with your name, email address, and create a password. Verify your email address through the confirmation link we'll send, and you're ready to use all features of MovieApp.

onMobile.question: Is MovieApp available on mobile devices?
onMobile.answer: Yes, MovieApp is available on both iOS and Android platforms. You can download our mobile app from the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. The mobile app provides all the features available on the web version, with additional benefits like push notifications for movie releases and ticket availability.

addFavorites.question: How do I add movies to my favorites?
addFavorites.answer: To add a movie to your favorites, simply click on the heart icon displayed on the movie card or detail page. You need to be logged in to use this feature. You can view and manage your favorites list by navigating to the "Favorites" section in your profile dashboard.

purchaseTickets.question: Can I purchase movie tickets through MovieApp?
purchaseTickets.answer: Yes, MovieApp offers ticket purchasing for participating theaters. When browsing movie sessions, look for the "Buy Tickets" button. You'll be guided through a secure checkout process where you can select seats, apply any discount codes, and complete your purchase using our supported payment methods.

searchMovies.question: How can I search for specific movies?
searchMovies.answer: You can search for movies using the search bar located in the header of our website or app. Enter the title, actor, director, or genre you're interested in. Our advanced search functionality allows for filtering by release year, runtime, rating, and more to help you find exactly what you're looking for.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
paymentMethods.answer: MovieApp accepts various payment methods including credit/debit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secured with industry-standard encryption to protect your financial information.

reportProblem.question: How do I report a problem or bug?
reportProblem.answer: If you encounter any issues while using MovieApp, please contact our support team through the "Help" section in your account settings or email us directly at support@movieapp.com. Please provide as much detail as possible about the problem, including what device and browser you're using, to help us resolve it quickly.

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.message: You do not have permission to access the admin panel.
